attributes.action: Allow the Catholic Church to not give children to gay couples to adopt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I as a Roman Catholic am a strong beliver in the family and a family can only begin with one man and one woman, not with two people of the same sex. I belive that Children are a gift from God and a childhood is precious and all children should be brought up in a loving hetrosexual family, as is God's law. Let us all remember that the laws of man are worthless against the laws of God. Those who wish to make these laws that go against God's law will someday answer and pay dearly for their sins.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
